update_content:
Release Info
- Version: 2.1.9

- Size: 15.5MB

- Filelinked code: 30837432

- FileDL code: 001478

- Modded version(like Ad-free version) cant be auto updated. Please use official version(download at beetvapk.me) to support developer.



Change logs

- Auto check autoplay next episode in setting.

- Add ability to choose secondary language subtitle.

- Fix eye icon not turn yellow for watched movie.

- Sort stream links by size.
description_player: Best player to work with BeeTV. Less ads and better streaming!
